src_original: auddhatyaṃ cittasyāvyupaśamaḥ /  vyupaśamo hi śamathaḥ /  tadviru[p. 70]ddho 'vyupaśamaḥ /  sa punā rāgānukūlaḥ pūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitādy anusmarato rāgāṃśikaś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ /  śamathaparipanthakarmakam //
kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ ,  sa kausīdyam /  kutsitaṃ sīdatīti kusīdaḥ /  vīryavipakṣaḥ /  vīryavipakṣa iti /
vīryaṃ hi kuśalapakṣaprayoge cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ ,  tadvipakṣatvāt kausīdyam /
